cycle_theory_engine.source: Camel Finance — Updated Cycle Trading Theory
cycle_theory_engine.description: Cycles of shorter duration exist inside cycles of longer duration. Larger cycles influence direction of shorter cycles. All cycles measured low-to-low.

XAUUSD.name: Gold Spot
XAUUSD.notes: Gold exhibits 2 drives pattern into cycle lows (swing low → bounce → undercut → new cycle). Also can produce timing-based lows (sideways chop, then breakout with no visible low).

SPX.name: S&P 500
SPX.notes: SPX also exhibits 2 drives pattern. Used for broad market drawdown monitoring.

BTC.name: Bitcoin
BTC.notes: Bitcoin does NOT produce 2 drives. Plunges into lows and violently bounces — V-shaped cycle lows.

daily_cycle.status: Approaching daily cycle high or already in decline into next DCL

weekly_cycle.status: Bullish — significant room to run before midpoint

tailwinds: Rate cut expectations (2-3 cuts priced in 2026)
Geopolitical risk premium (Iran, trade wars, Eastern Europe)
ETF inflows 801 tonnes in 2025 — 2nd largest on record

right_translated.definition: Cycle top forms AFTER the midpoint
right_translated.expectation: Short, sharp correction into next cycle low. Next low likely higher than prior low.

left_translated.definition: Cycle top forms BEFORE the midpoint
left_translated.expectation: Longer decline, cycle failure likely (close below prior cycle low). Next low likely lower.

mid_translated.definition: Cycle top forms AT the midpoint

cycle_failure.definition: Price closes below the prior cycle low within the current cycle
cycle_failure.action: Expect continued decline and lower low. Early warning of larger cycle topping.

cycle_inversion.definition: Half cycle low is forced into becoming an early cycle low
cycle_inversion.notes: Indicates seller exhaustion, often followed by violent rally. Watch for confirmation signals at half cycle low.

timing_based_low.definition: Price trades sideways into timing window, then pushes up without visible decline
timing_based_low.notes: No clear swing low visible. Confirmed by trendline break or MA cross. Must respect confirmation signals.

confirmation_signals.description: ALWAYS wait for confirmation before entering. 70-80% of lows form inside timing window, but 20-30% form outside.

methods.name: swing_low
methods.definition: A low followed by a candle that opens above the body of the low and closes above the upper wick of the low candle
methods.stop_loss: Place slightly below the swing low

methods.name: moving_average_cross
methods.definition: Price closes above the 10-period SMA after a suspected cycle low
methods.stop_loss: Place slightly below the cycle low

methods.name: oscillator_reversal
methods.definition: Momentum oscillator confirms reversal from oversold/bearish to bullish
methods.stop_loss: Place slightly below the cycle low

methods.name: trendline_breakout
methods.definition: Price closes above a descending trendline connecting recent swing highs/wicks
methods.stop_loss: Place slightly below the cycle low

confirmation_signals.rule: Execute on confirmation even if it occurs slightly outside the expected timing window. Missing the new cycle is worse than a slightly late entry.

nuances.rule_of_alternation: Shorter cycles tend to be followed by longer cycles and vice versa. If a cycle forms earlier than expected, expect the next to run longer than expected.

two_drives_pattern.definition: Swing low → counter-trend bounce → undercut of low (lower low or double bottom) → swing low → new cycle begins
variations: Occasional: higher low on second drive

v_shaped_low.definition: Sharp plunge into cycle low with violent bounce — no 2 drives, just a V-shape

fractal_confirmation.bullish_weekly: Expect multiple right-translated daily cycles without cycle failure
fractal_confirmation.bearish_weekly: Expect first daily cycle to right-translate, then multiple left-translated + failed daily cycles
fractal_confirmation.bullish_weekly_final_dc: Typical to see one left-translated daily cycle at the end of a bullish weekly cycle before decline into WCL

signals_monitored.name: swing_low_detector
signals_monitored.logic: Identify candle that opens above body of prior low candle AND closes above upper wick of prior low candle

signals_monitored.name: sma_cross_detector
signals_monitored.logic: Price closes above SMA(10) after being below it for 2+ days

signals_monitored.name: rsi_reversal_detector
signals_monitored.logic: RSI(14) crosses above 30 from below (oversold reversal) OR RSI crosses above 50 from below

signals_monitored.name: macd_cross_detector
signals_monitored.logic: MACD line crosses above signal line while both are below zero (bullish cross from oversold)

signals_monitored.name: trendline_break_detector
signals_monitored.logic: Auto-draw descending trendline from last 2-3 swing highs. Alert when daily close breaks above trendline.
